channel.title: Age of Ravens: Rats of NIMH Meets Evil Hogwarts (Gauntlet Blog)
channel.description:
New post today revisits an older post from *Age of Ravens*. I've been hunting through for game concepts I haven't gotten to the table. In this case it comes from a 2010 comic project. It's a two-page pitch for a fantasy animal-based story. So ignore the bad game fiction form factor and instead consider these questions: a. is the concept interesting enough to play in and b. how would you?

item.title: Age of Ravens: Rats of NIMH Meets Evil Hogwarts (Gauntlet Blog)
item.dc:creator: @Michael_G_Barford
item.description:
@Michael_G_Barford wrote:

I like how this story could exist as an evolution of a plot point that was kind of overlooked. “Yeah so these weird wizards are experimenting on animals.” “Huh, weird, anyway we’re here for the treasure, guess we’ll have to fight this weird pig along the way.” I think that you’re on the right track with Fate, especially when combining “animal” aspects with “monstrous or magical” aspects. I also like it as a magical take on Animal Farm.
